trends: There have been no other sightings in Bethel Island
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsabout 4:00am i was standing in my boat looked toward the north when a fireball appeared in the sky then noticed there were 2 stagered then a third one appered a ways behind the two then watched it catch up to the other two and all three flew stagered .about 4 minets later a fourth one appered by itself and came and went in the same direction i watched the til they were to far to see. ( i do have them on my camara on my phone) i have 1 picture and 2 phone video on my phone
